scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run db:start" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.start:prod: cd backend && npm run build && npm start
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../database && npm install
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:migrate: cd database && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:generate: cd database && npx prisma generate && cd ../backend && npx prisma generate
scripts.reset: npm run db:stop && npm run clean && rm -f **/*.db && npm run install:all
